It's not an easy job -- indeed, I often wish I could be just another chump on the street, having sex with only a few women in his lifetime. But I was born with a purpose, and I must fulfill it.

Sometimes I imagine myself with a ten-foot-long green and brown boa constrictor instead of my penis. The boa is a hungry beast, satisfied only by the taste of pussy. I struggle to live a normal life, but the boa steers my every move, forcing me to approach women and seduce them. If the boa starves, I must also die, so it is my unfortunate task to keep it hungry. When it's angry, the boa bites at my fingers, demanding that I feed it. However, it is also a trustworthy friend, always there for me in times of trouble. I respect and fear the boa.
